'''Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz''' is a Quest Item obtained during the {{Quest|Ann's Story}}.

It replaces [[Jabberwock's Holy Sword]] and during the {{Quest|Search in the Algae Sea (Quest)}} is itself replaced by [[Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz (Search in the Algae Sea)|Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz]].
